text_raw:
2. The Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 
of 2006) are amended in Regulation 32(4)(b), in the Table to that Regulation, by

heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulation 
2006 (S.I. 537 of 2006) to provide for noting on a driving licence that that licence 
has been issued in exchange for a licence issued by the driver licensing authority 
in Ukraine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [193]
